structure.unit: Regulation Of Trade And Certain Enterprises

law.text: [ Text of section effective until August 1, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 106, Sec. 4. See 2012, 106, Sec. 9.] Whoever operates a private trade school without being licensed under section twenty-one B or whoever acts as a representative of a private trade school without being licensed under section twenty-one E shall be punished by imprisonment in jail or house of correction for not more than six months or by a fine of not more than one thousand dollars.
